title: Orientation of the camera

description: Episode number 6 of Series "Lessons in visual language". Looks at the relationship of the viewer to the screen, and the way in which attention is absorbed into the world of the filmmaker, affecting the viewer's own orientation. Notes also the physical support of the camera and its orientation in space.
